snippet: The opposition had asked the court to reject changes to the way votes are cast, saying that the new system will make it more difficult to form alliances.
abstract: Kuwait's Constitutional Court dissolves Parliament and calls for new elections under voting system that was rejected by the opposition, move that could increase political volatility.
lead_paragraph: The opposition had asked the court to reject changes to the way votes are cast, saying that the new system will make it more difficult to form alliances.

headline.main: Kuwait Court Dissolves Parliament and Calls Vote That Opposition May Boycott
headline.print_headline: Kuwait Court Dissolves Parliament and Calls Vote That Opposition May Boycott
